data.name: GraphicRendererVCL
desc: Service that describes the necessary interfaces and properties to render a graphic container of XGraphic type.
To render a XGraphic container, just create an instance of this service, set the appropriate properties and use the XGraphicRenderer interface to initiate the rendering process itself

properties.name: DestinationRect
desc: Specifies the destination rectangle, into which the graphic content is to be rendered onto the device.

properties.name: Device
desc: Holds the device onto which the XGraphic container should be rendered.
In case of using VCL Devices, this property should hold a com.sun.star.awt.XDevice interface

properties.name: RenderData
desc: Additional properties for rendering, unspecified at the moment.
